client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first met Peters Vandenberghe Peeters at a wine tasting event in Brussels. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Peters Vandenberghe Peeters is a 22 year old and comes from Belgium.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description_Family_Background: Peters Vandenberghe Peeters is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: In 2022, Peters graduated from Koninklijk Atheneum Boom with a secondary school diploma.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Peters Vandenberghe Peeters is a 22 year old and comes from Belgium.
Peters Vandenberghe Peeters did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not manage to save any money during his career.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 1570000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Hedge Fund Manager, in 2019, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
